Sept. 21, 1929 D North Craven Contest
North Craven Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
north-craven-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
A Souvenir of the Opera
Settle, North Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £8, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest(own choice)- 1st(1) Haworth Public, 2nd(10s.) Yeadon Old. Hymn tune contest - 1st(£1)Haworth Public, 2nd(10s.) Barnoldswick. Promoted by Settle and Giggleswick Brass Bands. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 15, 2013, 11:35 a.m. Oct. 15, 2013, 11:48 a.m.
1 Barnoldswick Prize Band Joe Smith
2 Yeadon Old Band Walter Jackson
3 Leyland Subscription T. Smalley
4 Skipton Prize F. L. Metcalfe
Unknown Result Burley & Ilkley W. I. Warburton
